body: Xiao Mi from the China Media Project interviewed Hu Yong on the Chinese online culture of "surrounding gaze", who explains why netizens believe that they can change the world by the collective action of gaze.
original_body: Xiao Mi from the China Media Project interviewed Hu Yong on the Chinese online culture of "surrounding gaze", who explains why netizens believe that they can change the world by the collective action of gaze.
title: China: Politics of the surrounding gaze

sentence: Xiao Mi from the China Media Project interviewed Hu Yong on the Chinese online culture of "surrounding gaze", who explains why netizens believe that they can change the world by the collective action of gaze.
